system.note: Can be reused if picked up again. Shocking effect occurs even if the weapon doesn't do damage. If target fails toughness test, stunned for one round, +1 round per DoF.

description.value:
Special: Shocking

Note: Can be reused if picked up again. Shocking effect occurs even if the weapon doesn't do damage. If target fails toughness test, stunned for one round, +1 round per DoF.
